pullRequest.title: Moved NotificationManager to common and created notification tasks
pullRequest.bodyText:
Seperated Notifications to NotificationTasks
Seperate ZMS and common functionality in Notifications
Moved NotificationManager to Common
Created DomainRoleMembersFetcher interface to be used for getting role members
from different sources (ZMS DB / ZTS cache)


I confirm that this contribution is made under the terms of the license found in the root directory of this repository's source tree and that I have the authority necessary to make this contribution on behalf of its copyright owner.

nodes.bodyText: Constants that also exist in ZMS project. Prefered to avoid deleting them and redirecting to the common constants at this point as it will require changes in a lot of files (redirecting them to the common version).

nodes.bodyText: Kept the same property value even though it is now in Common to avoid breaking existing clients.

Utils that also exist in ZMS project. Preferred to avoid deleting them and redirecting to the common utils at this point as it will require changes in a lot of files (redirecting them to the common version).

commit.message:
Moved NotificationManager to common and created notification tasks

- Seperated Notifications to NotificationTasks
- Seperate ZMS and common functionality in Notifications
- Moved NotificationManager to Common
- Created DomainRoleMembersFetcher interface to be used for getting role members
from different sources (ZMS DB / ZTS cache)
